cleaned_reviews: pasar seni metro station is a beautiful and welldesigned transit hub conveniently located near central market and chinatown its prime location allows you to explore many vibrant streets and cultural landmarks within walking distance â€¦

strategic mrt station easy connection to china town and kl traffic police station tun hs lee clean and convenient

as the name suggests this is the station that services the pasar senicentral market area the lrt kelana jaya line and mrt kajang line passes through this station this is naturally ventilated and naturally lighted cleanliness wise it is pretty much clean and well kept

i have taken mrt and lrt lines regularly i noticed that the government has introduced this lady coach this is a very good policy however i noticed that some ladies do not take advantages of the lady coach they preferred to occupied â€¦
trains reach in rapid timings depends on the timings but theres no proper queue to enter or leave the trains very clean and neatly kept place for an everyday use platform

make sure to check your place of destination to wait on the correct platform and get on the next train there are a lot of signages everywhere that will help you identify where desk help is also available if you want someone to clarify routes with
